result.execSummary:
The defendant Brian L Mallam was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Burglary-Building or Dwelling, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.10(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Not to have any contact with M. Sousek
Comply with any and all conditions DOC may impose.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brian L Mallam

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: for Termination from Drug & Alcohol Court
St. vs. Brian Mallam.  Count 1- Must be a year probabtion.  Same conditions. Amend JOC.
copy of PSI to both Atty's
Sentencing hearing on October 24, 2014 at 03:30 pm.
Status hrg or plea on August 25, 2014 at 11:00 am.
copy of competency eval report to both atty's
Dr. Minter
Status conference on August 5, 2014 at 11:00 am.

Defendant, Brian L Mallam appeared with Attorney Chris A Gramstrup.  Attorney Thomas H Frost appeared for the State.  Also has 13 CM 213, 14 CF 18, 14 CF 37, 14 CF 48 and 14 CF 52.  9:25 AM Court calls cases and appearances.  Atty Gramstrup makes stmt - raises the issue of competency to assist.  Court will order custodial evaluation by Dr. Minter.  If trial in Sawyer is not resolved this case to be rescheduled.  Status conference scheduled for August 5, 2014 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on June 23, 2014 at 09:15 am.

Defendant, Brian L Mallam appeared with Attorney Chris A Gramstrup.  Attorney Thomas H Frost appeared for the State. Court calls case and appearances, also has 14CF17, 14CF18, 14CF37, 14CF48, 14CF52.  Atty Gramstrup speaks to the court and requests a reset with status.  Bail will continue.  Status conference scheduled for June 23, 2014 at 09:15 am.
Status conference on June 2, 2014 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Brian L Mallam in court with attorney Chris A. Gramstrup.  Defendant Brian L Mallam in custody.  Thomas Henry Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 13 CM 213, 14 CF 17 and 14 CF 37.  Atty Gramstrup waived reading as to 14 CF 48 and waived right to prelim.  Court addressed the defendant re: his right to a prelim.  Defendant does not wish to have a prelim.  Court finds defendant has freely waived his right to a preliminary exam.  Finds probable cause and binds the defendant over for trial.   Recess 20 minutes
Status conference on April 9, 2014 at 08:55 am.
Status conference on April 3, 2014 at 04:15 pm.
Status conference on March 31, 2014 at 10:45 am.

Defendant Brian L Mallam in court with attorney Martin Jarvis.  Defendant Brian L Mallam in custody.  Thomas Henry Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls case. Also has 14CF18,14CF17,13CM213.  Court calls case and reviews the new charges. Mr. Mallam pleads guilty to count 3. Waives time limits for a preliminary exam. 
State does not want Mr. Mallam to get out of jail as he has mulitple charges for bail jumping. Atty Jarvis speaks regarding the bail. Court reviews the bail conditions. Court amends the bail to $250.00 cash, $1,000.00 signature. No contact with Sarah Mallam or children not more than 500 feet from premisis.  Preliminary hearing for 14CF37 scheduled for March 25, 2014 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on March 14, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Brian L Mallam in court with attorney Martin Jarvis.  Defendant Brian L Mallam in custody.  Thomas Henry Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Waived reading. Not guilty plea is entered.
Arraignment on March 10, 2014 at 11:30 am.

Defendant, Brian L Mallam appeared with Attorney Martin Jarvis.  Attorney Thomas H. Frost appeared for the State.  Also 14 CF 18 and CM case.  Atty Frost makes statement as to 14 CF 17.  Atty Jarvis has no comment.  Court finds probable cause and binds the defendant over for trial on 14 CF 17.  14 CF 18 - state makes stmt.  No comment by Atty Jarvis makes stmt.  Court finds probable case and binds the defendant over for trial.  Atty Jarvis makes arguement re: CM case on motion to vacate DGPA.  Arraignment scheduled for March 10, 2014 at 11:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on March 3, 2014 at 09:00 am.

Defendant, Brian L Mallam appeared with Attorney J. Martin Jarvis.  Attorney Thomas Frost appeared for the State.   Also 14 CF 18.   Court recalls case.  Atty Jarvis waived reading of both files.  Atty Jarvis waived time limits.

Attorney J. Martin Jarvis in court.  Thomas Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 14 CF 18.  10:23 am Court calls case.  State requests warrant. Atty Jarvis makes stmt defendant having vehicle problems.   Court warrants ordered hold until 11:00 AM
No contact with C.S.
